title: Sadist
description: Sadist, is the Turkish translation for Into the Basement. It will be released in 94 D&R KÄ°TAPSAN Book Stores throughout Turkey on July 2011.It's a graphic thriller about two serial killers who steal women and torturethem in the basement. In San Francisco, women are disappearing. Threedetectives pull Kim Bennett into the game. The hunt for a killer. She goesmissing!This is a raw dark story of sadistic people thatpits Kim's physical and mental agility against one of the fastest rising crimesin America, sexual slavery.This is an adult story that has been described as"juicy."
author: Norm Applegate
